customise.heading: Customise
widget.subtext: Embed your Bridebook widget into your website to allow couple enquiries directly into your Enquiry Manager, letting you manage them in one place.
embed.heading: Embed
instruction.for.install: Ask your website developer to copy this code into your website and voila! You can start managing your enquiries in one, easy place. <2>Need help?</2>
preview.heading: Preview
howYourWidgetWillLook.subtext: How your widget will look on your website.
